/* com.innobiz.orange.web.ap.dao.ApClsInfoDDao.selectApClsInfoD */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM AP_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = M.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.REGR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) REGR_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MODR_NM,
FROM (
SELECT
* FROM (SELECT N.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT
T.ORG_ID, T.CLS_INFO_ID, T.CLS_INFO_PID, T.RESC_ID, T.CLS_INFO_NM, T.SORT_ORDR, T.USE_YN, T.SYS_CLS_INFO_YN, T.REGR_UID, TO_CHAR(T.REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') REG_DT, T.MODR_UID, TO_CHAR(T.MOD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') MOD_DT,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM AP_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = T.RESC_ID AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) RESC_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.REGR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) REGR_NM, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = NVL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MODR_NM,
FROM AP_CLS_INFO_D T
AND T.ORG_ID = #{orgId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.CLS_INFO_ID = #{clsInfoId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.USE_YN = #{useYn, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.ORG_ID, T.CLS_INFO_ID
) N WHERE ROWNUM <= #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1) * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
